name: Green Avoid the Red Junk
description:
Hello,

Green Avoid the Red Junk is a 20 x 20 pixel AutoRunner. You play as the valiant green square trying to reach the blue line. Beware the Red void on either side and try to finish all 20 levels.  Best of luck. 

Conditions: 

20x20 pixel view port

20 lines of code

20 levels

Controls: 

Space bar = reverse gravity while in contact with the black platforms and advances through message screens.
